Headline: #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Fulton
ShortDescription: Northbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Fulton, Oakley, Hubbard and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Fulton, Oakley, Hubbard and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Fulton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago Ave/Ogden
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago Avenue, Western, Augusta, Damen, and Chicago Avenue due to, street blockage near Chicago Ave/Ogden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago Avenue, Western, Augusta, Damen, and Chicago Avenue due to, street blockage near Chicago Ave/Ogden.

Allow extra travel time.
